TopicTitle: Reporting in from Funthill (Niagara Falls), Kanada

Articles.Content:
Glad to see all the interesting and diverse kerbalz who are contributing, and that this was good timing as I just picked up this edutainment superpower back in June. Great job to all. So stoked for next upgreyedd (double dose of courage and stupidity).

Budgets, contracts, 64 bit; oh yeah !
Hello and welcome. Everyone is getting excited about the update and it promises to be a big one. I hope you feel at home here.
Welcome aboard, Thinly-disguised-hitchhiker-reference! I think we're all there with you, the next update is gonna be great.
